about_the_game:
Try to find your way out of your own apartment.

A surreal and giant labyrinth

Upon receiving a cryptic voicemail from your missing roommate, the ordinary confines of your apartment transform into a surreal labyrinth. Guided by his voice and a custom retro console in hand, embark on a journey to decipher the mysteries that have twisted your home into an enigmatic maze.

But beware. The further you venture into other realities, the harder it will be to find your way back.

An immersive and mind-bending escape game

  • Explore nested apartments — Uncover new rooms, find clues, and try to make sense of the interconnected doors and corridors, leading you further and further into the unknown.

  • A retro pass — Use the mysterious GameLeaf to complete challenging levels, collect hidden items, and unlock new areas to explore. Every game is a piece of the puzzle that brings you closer to uncovering the truth behind Fael's disappearance.

  • Inventory of fixtures — Pay close attention to details: from photo frames to seemingly-irrelevant furniture, everything you see could be a clue to solve the puzzle.

  • Experimentation is key — Interact with the scenery, pick up objects, combine them. The world of your apartment is full of surprises, and you'll need to think outside the box to progress. But as you unravel Fael’s mysterious disappearance, you'll begin to question the nature of reality itself.

name: Looking For Fael

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-4690K
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Hey, it's Fael... Listen, this is going to sound strange, but... I think I got lost in the apartment. I don't know where I am. You think you could come help me?
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support
